content.detailedDescription: Hanging out with friends outside in a grass area. then i see a very bright star and point it out to a friend a few minutes later. most friends believed it was a star, and one thought it was a plane. but it was extraordinarily bright. then it appeared to be moving at an upward diagonal, and before we knew it, it was approaching in our direction and was immediately above us just one minute after thinking it was a star. it was like it changed shapes and lights formations the whole way and so first appeared to be a plane approaching with bright white lights, then a triangle with blue and red lights on the tips, and then an airplane as it was right above us, i meant directly above us. and it couldn't have been more than 700 feet above the ground but strangely enough, if we weren't outside i doubt we would have ever heard it because it was sooo quiet, and the sound was like that of a super sonic jet, only muffled as it flew relatively slow above us. and a strange thing about the aircraft as if flew directly above us was that it had three very bright lights in a triangle formation on the front of the cockpit and never before have i seen that on an airplane. i am convinced that this is an alien craft that can not only change its shape but also make sounds to resemble an airplane. at the time of the event, all the things i described happened so fast that i my mind couldn't comprehend what was happening, so i simply had to tell myself that it had to be an airplane. i was not scared much but definitely excitedm confused and mystified. i just watched it fly off in the shape of some kind of long airplane until it went out of my sight behind the houses
content.summary: First appeared to be bright star, then enlarging sphere, then triangle, then a very strange looking airplane

content.detailedDescription:
According to the evidence that i have, boomerang ufos have already come nine times to visit my house.  there are four different types of  them. 

please add this attached picutre to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: http://ufo-spacelife.Blogspot.Com/
content.summary: Invisible boomerang ufo

content.detailedDescription:
First i would like to tell you that about a year ago i wrote you about a sighting i saw. this time there is no dowt in my mind what i saw and a few family members saw. here is what we witnessed...
 i was out side with my new dog it was between 10:30-11:30pm monday october 19 2009,when it started. i was sitting down smoking when i had noticed a loud jet fly by which i thought was strange, then i see a police hellicopter going over my house.(i think 2 hellicopters went by) dogs are barking and it was just weird to see that. i made a joke about "war of the worlds" and as i am standing out in the middle of my yard i see this thing going across the sky. it looked like a sattlelight moving. but then the direction changed, it started swaying back and forth like a rocking motion. there is nothing we have that can do that. i yelled for my brother to come out and see. i pointed to what i was looking at and then he had told me did you see it just stop and take off. i told him that i did and as we were looking he couldn't believe what he was witnessing. i couldn't either! it would zoom fast, sway. so basically it went over my house and changed it direction kind of like a u-turn. we ran out in my front yard and continued to watch it untill we couldn't see it no more. we discussed what we just saw and new that it wasn't something of our own. i was so amazed i went back out to my backyard and started to look up again. in my mind i was expecting something to be on the news because of all of the activity in the sky. right above my house there is this star formation that has 3 stars across then below it in the middle was another one. kind of like an arrow shape. the bottom one was moving like it was playing around. almost like a swimming motion. it looked like a star that was moving to where it wasnt noticable to where if you looked up you would say "what's that in the sky" it seemed to be out of the atmasphere. (i can explain it much better talking to someone, it's hard to write what i saw so bare with me) it was going in circles and it would go in one direction and then instantly change direction. it was moving to where it was staying in the star formation. it did this for about an hour or more. i notice that when it moved i can almost see tracers from the light coming from it. it would go right to left up and down and like i said circle motions. it seemed to me that it was watching something or waiting. i don't know if it had to do with that jet in the sky or not but it was something else? i can say that i have seen a ufo. i know what sattlelights look like, i know what a plane looks like and this wasnt one of those. we know what we saw and i could put my hand on the bible and swear to what i saw. i really thought there was going to be other witnesses to this or on the news, that's how postive i was. it was an experiece of a life time! i didn't know what to do about this. but everyone keeps telling me to write you guys. so that's where i am right now. all i know is what i saw and it needed to be shared with you guys. just to let you know i am not the kind of person who fabricates things like this. i do believe that we are not alone in this universe. if you have any questions about what i told you please feel free to write me back. i can maybe then explain to you what i saw and maybe then you can maybe tell me what i saw or if there was anyone else that had seen the same thing. like i said this note is a little confusing. sorry! thank you for your time to read my letter.
bye the way i didn't get any vidio or pictures cause i don't have a good camera that can take pictures in the night sky especially stars. i am dissapointed that i couldn't, all i have is in memory. thanks again!
sara churney
content.summary: Star like, moving fast, changing direction instantly, swaying back and forth.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my front yard with a family member and a friend. i was facing east when i observed bright object in the sky headed west at extremely high speed from an eastern direction. as the object was headed west it was making sudden stops and it would disappear. the object would then reappear and continue traveling west very fast leaving behind what appeared to be a streak of light. while the object continued to travel west it disappeared for approximately 10 seconds. the object then reappeared and began to travel south. while the object was traveling south it would make sudden stops disappear and reappear and continue south leaving behind a streak of light.
content.summary: Glowing object

content.detailedDescription:
Source by my neighbor. he told me he was outside his front yard looking towards the east along with other eye witnesses. he then observed a fire ball headed west coming form the east at very high speed. my neighbor said he thought it was a meteor at first. he then said it made an immidiate stop for about 30 seconds and then began to head south in a low rate of speed. he then said all of a sudden it streaked away towards the south leaving behind a light trail. my neighbor says the obeject was approx 1000ft in the air.
 
i just want to advise mufon that i have filed this report with the knowledge of the eye witness. since i am very interested in this subject i took it upon my self to report this sighting. i know it is hear-say and also know how important it is to the ufo community to have credable witnesses. i believe my neighbor will come forward if you have any questions.
content.summary: Fireball meteor type

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for my morning ride, and was looking up to see if there were any stray orionids, even though the shower was over.   i turned to my right and saw a white ball, not moving, not a plane. at arms length maybe the size of a quarter, as i watched it, it just suddenly 'fell' straight down, no trail of any kind.  then i turned to look behind me and there was a larger white ball, at arms length maybe like a 50 cent piece. also very stationary, i kept watching it and it began to 'dissolve' slowly within itself, til a pinpoint, then was gone.  as it dissolved, it's shape was hazy as the pinpoint dissolved. the sky was black again.  neither of these spheres moved and they were not planes or meteors. not being good at distances, they were maybe, at ground level, a couple hundred yards apart,not real high and not real low. it was a beautiful experience, and i feel blessed to have seen this, like so many others have seen. i will keep looking up.
content.summary: 2 stationary white spheres, one small, one larger. small one fell, large dissolved in itself.

content.detailedDescription:
Eversince through out this past summer, right after my best friend had passed away, every so often when i get home from work, after when i get off of the bus at the corner, its still daylight at about 6pm. 

as i walk down the street going towards my house, i see a ghostly hazy image of a smog that looks like a real old looking huge dc-3 aircraft from the 1950s. 

i see this airplane as it just sit there parked on top of the roof as it hovers over my 3 flat apartment house. seeing this thing as it read ���ozark airlines��� as plain as day. 

as soon as i turn my head for a split second, poof! it is long gone! 

this has happened right after my good friend who recently had passed away, because he used to fly home on family visits on ozark airlines from o'hare airport to his hometown in quincy il.

one evening last week my brother had met me up at the 7-11 store on the corner, and he had seen the same thing i did. and he recalls that he too at one time he had flown on ozark airline when he was drafted into the army this was back in 1969. 

why am i seeing this thing for? 
is he coming back to haunt me?
or maybe i just realy and truly missed him and that his way of saying that i am here?...
content.summary: A ghostly airplane ? (from the1950s era) or am i going nuts?

content.detailedDescription: Paw paw lake faceing east,dark out noticed a bright white light 500 ft away,300 ft up,want out with video cam,light not moveing,then see a second light,very fant,go from south to north,fly under first light very slow.Then first ligt moves toward me to west.Then see a flashing white light,on left and right,on craft.Other fant light on north side of lake.Then first light all most over me,i see a strobe,light and here a motor,realize it was just two planes,or was it,go inside.At 8:40 i see two blue lights,to the east not moveing, go out side.Cant here any thing,then lights move towards me to west,i here two helicopters,then see a white light with the blue light,no strobe light,on helicopters. then one takes off,extremely fast,next helicopter follows,they head west,had to be military,folllowing the craft west,very x-files like,maybe not planes....
content.summary: Saw white lights,not moveing, then ,military  helicopters show up.

content.detailedDescription:
I like to report an incident , which occurred 30 years ago ��� somewhere in october / november 1978. 
together with a friend , we were traveling by car in the east part of france heading to strasbourg. it was already night , might be 10pm or 11pm , 50-60 miles south of strasbourg on a motorway and still we had to drive 1hour  to our destination. we have been tiered already , so we decided to stop on a park place for to take a little rest and to eat a snack. it was a starlit night and while resting , we looked to the starry-sky. 
after a while , we recognized that out of the star-scene in the west of the starry-sky a bright lighting star dissolved out from the star-alliance and started to move. that light point ( approx. 30��� above the horizon ), moved , even jumped , very rapidly up and down , left and right , zigzag and perpendicular. we tried somehow to estimate / scale the magnitude of those movements by stretching or arm forward for to see how many fingers the movement ranged. so far i remember , the movement from the light-point covered approx. the width of 2-3 fingers on a stretched arm , crossed in less than a second. 
on the beginning from that ���light-show��� in the sky , we thought that an airplane or helicopter might be responsible for this , but we rejected this idea because: 1st  the movement started from a fixed-position and 2nd the profile of movements was so incredible ��� rapidly in speed and rapidly in changing of move-directions.
from our location we could not estimate how far away from us that light-point was , as according our first impression , that light-point appeared just as a bright star. 
we could not hear any noise , either . 

the light-point movements went on for some time and after a while we decided not to look further to that "light-show" in the sky and not to bother ourselves with things we cannot explain. 
somehow deep impressed and confused we left the scene and continued to drive towards to strasbourg. we promised ourselves not tell anyone about that event , because we thought that nobody will believe us and we feared of ridicule. 


however , 30 years past , but the memory on that night is for me still present  as it was yesterday.
i am reporting that case now , because internet does provide now the opportunity to shear those experiences with an open-minded community. maybe someone has a simple explanation for that .
content.summary: Jumping light-point in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Ok so i normally dont believe in ufo's etc but last night my brother went out to have a cigarette before bed, he comes in and states he has just seen something freaky.

he stated that he briefly looked up at the sky and seen a massive bright yellow triangle that was there for a second then shot away where it fastly got smaller until it was gone, this all lasted a couple of seconds, i initially said it was a satellite until he went on further to say this was the size of a football pitch... he had no idea what it was but said its the first thing hes seen in the sky that he could not explain.

now most people i would not believe, but my nan and grandad always said they seen ufo's and now my brother is saying the same thing, he has no reason to lie and is a level headed normal person like myself.

any explanation for this?
content.summary: Large yellow triangle

content.detailedDescription:
I have been noticing at night many "shooting stars" tonight i counted 24 of them. but i the previous last couple of nights i have counted only around 7 to 10. this has sparked my interest in shooting star watching. tonight i was on my back porch when i saw a red shniing object  suddenly appear and move over our house so i ran out to the fron door and watched it untill it stopped and ten another shining star like light began binking on and off . then the red  object would do the same.I watched the star like object move over to the red object and they  both dissapeared. i sat outside to see if something else would happen, when i oberved many more shooting stars appear ad at one point i saw very far up in the sky a white falsh of light that moved in a spiral motion and the it also dissapeared as well. 
     in terms of describing my feelings i felt no fear but i felt excitement.And i waited outside hoping to see more.
   yet on my first observation night of the shooting starss i woke up at 5 am to smoke a cigarette and witnessed sseveral shooting stars in which all were heading in the same direction. i suddenly felt fearful and although it was dark out side i saw something like  a shape of a human in the back yard where tall weeds are the only thinng out back besides a small fence to keep in th dogs from getting off the property. the human shape was rather tall and what frightened me the most was that it was coming in my direction and it looked like a vague light was outlining the shape and i could see the tall weeds through it. as it moved closer it did not disturb the weeds as it moved through them.I only witnessed this for  about 3 seconds and quickly went back into the house and locked the door. i could not go back to sleep becausei was so frightened.
content.summary: Bright red moving object  stopped mid air and another object began flashing.

content.detailedDescription: I was up working late on some files for the next day and went out back to have a smoke. i turned on the light and sat at the table.  as i looked out towards the yard, i saw a star that seemed to be flickering.  i thought it was something to do with the clouds.  i then saw it move to the left and right.  i went back in to get my glasses.  as i looked more, the light was going side to side, up and down in a 12 inch section of sky.  my oldest son has his bedroom next to where i smoke and i knocked on his window to come out.  he came out but then went back to get his glasses.  he saw the same motions of the object that i had been seeing.  we also saw several shooting stars close to the vacinity of the object.  there were no flashing lights but it did change in intensity.  i called up for my other son but he did not get up.  my wife came out to see what was going on and saw this as well.  she had to work later and went back to bed.  i then called my younger brother in boston to see if he could see anything from there but it was too cloudy for him.  i told him i would talk to him tomorrow.  i got my camera but i could not focus the object.  my older son got a flashlight with a red laser light and he flashed it at the object.  the object then began to move away until it was no longer visible.
content.summary: Circular light danced across a section of sky before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Ok, im not entirely sure if it was a ufo that i saw but there is no current scientific explantion of what i witnessed. my friend i were standing in my driveway smoking cigarettes when we both noticed a bright flash in the sky like a camera flash, it didnt really come from any specific point but more of a general area of the night sky, as soon as the flash subsided (which only lasted for a split second) a large streak appeared horizontaly (it appeared all at once, not extending) where the flash came from. i would have thought it was a meteor or comet except for the fact that the streak was not moving, it appeared and stayed completely still, it was incredibly bright and large, probably about the size of orions belt. the streak was a white light but it looked like it had a blueish gray tint around it, it was visible for approximatly 20seconds then it slowly started to fade away until there was nothing there. i have tried to figure out what this was to great lengths only to find there is no explanation for such a celestial occurence. the flash was white and the streak following it was a simple thick line stretching across the night sky, i can not stress enough the fact that the streak did not move, it appeared all at once and stayed where it was until it faded away. to be honest it looked alot like when spacecraft in science fiction movies make a "jump to hyperspace", bright flash, followed by a still trail of light, i know that sounds ridiculous but i just want to describe it to the best of my ability. please if you have heard of anything else like this let me know, i cant let this go unnoticed, its been killing me, i have never seen anything like it before in my life.
content.summary: Bright flash in the sky followed by a still trail that dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: My fianc��� and i were taking a walk in town around 8:00pm. my fianc��� said to me look at the moon, it looks like a smiley face. while walking down the sidewalk the moon was right in front of us.  then all of a sudden i look up and under the moon there was this bright light and it was pulsating. i said to her, that looks weird. the light would get brighter and then darker but not completely turning out. i looked at other lights in the sky to compare and they were blinking on and off, not up and down like a dimmer switch. also while looking at this it seem like it was changing color. it was moving slowly in a straight line across the sky in the south east.  then it came to a complete stop for a second or two and then started moving again. then lost sight of it behind the trees. it was weird to me because i never seen something like this in the sky pulsating, moving slowly, changing color and stopping and going. don���t know but it was sure strange.
content.summary: Taking a walk, looking at moon and saw a pulsating light moving slowly under the moon.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from work at around 5:15 p.M. noticed a large cigar shaped object to the west. at first thought it may have been a blimp but driving closer saw that there were no tail fins or nose. the object stayed motionless in the sky and was a non reflective dark grey in appearance. if i had to describe the size i would say that it was the size of the good year blimp.
content.summary: Dark grey, size of a blimp.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back just laying down on a piece of lawn furniture pretty bored then right over my head really high up was a white cigar shaped thing and as soon as i saw it my whole body got this weird warming sensation then it faded out and faded back more rounded this time might have just been like the angle then i ran in my house to get my camera still warm and tingly then when it faded back into sight i lined it up but when i pressed record it left again but there were jets looking like they were chasing it to the south came from north going south with it then a few minutes late it reappeared on the other side of my neighbors house that i lost it behind going west and just stopped so i got three pictues of it the whole time i was still warm and my dog was howling her brains out and she never howls then it shot off so fast it made the trees under it move and it was shortly followed by jets that didn't have a chance
content.summary: White orb or cigar

content.detailedDescription: I justed got home and it was at night so i sat down on my front stairs of my house and talked on the phone and time went by i got tired and hanged up the phone and as soon i got of the phone i herd this tip of weird havering tip air nose so i looked to my left hand side and saw a super big all black triangle and it seem to have sum tip of tinted windows on it and had yellowish lights turning on one by one in a straight line after the line lighted up the next row of lines start up in the same pattern but different rows it had about 5 rows and after all the 5 rows lit up the first row that went on now seem to turn off one by one it was just to true to be true it was heading tors the mall so i said to my self the police will see that [cms/tg/pd] or sum one will but now one saw what i seen because the wasn't any reports about it so now i am reporting what i saw it was flying super slow but fast in the same time so weird to me it was flying over my nabers houses a cross the street the craziest thing was i told my sister what had happened and  she believed me kinda but every month i would remind her what i have had seen but the year went by and guss what happened!!!!!!!  i mention what i seen again  guss what!!!!!!! my sister read the news paper that same day and!!!!! the same exact object i seen was seen in texas and it was a year later now !!!!! a lot of people seen what i seen so theres my evidence in the news paper it headed to texas but my question y?!!!!!! when i first seen it i didn't know what to think but in my state of mind i felt like there was sum one looking at me from that weird ufo triangle thing ....... the only reason i lost site of the plane because theres a free way bridge covering the other side it was heading i felt so weird to see such a thing!!
content.summary: All black super big triangle with yellow light turning on one by one

content.detailedDescription: I'm a student at pasadena city college. at around 10:50 am i was walking down colorado blvd. heading to class when i heard the faint noise of a helicopter. i looked up to see a black colored helicopter hovering over campus at a very high altitude. i then noticed toward the north, over the mountains, a bright cylinder shaped object moving slowly in a north-east direction. it clearly had no helicopter blades, or wings. its movement was not like a balloon either, it would move toward the north-east, then stop and hover completely still, then move again in the same direction, it did this about 4 or 5 times, then as it got farther it faded out of view. once it was out of view the helicopter then left in a north-west direction, as though it had been observing it.
content.summary: Bright, cylinder shaped object

content.detailedDescription: The witness submitted a number of pictures and videos to this investigator.  these were forwarded to photoanalyst marc d'antonio. he has analyzed the "rope" video.
content.summary: Videos taken by witness

content.detailedDescription: I believe that i have been one of the lucky ones to see such a sight one that i still cant understand what it was im sure it was a ufo but its hard to believe that i could ever see such a thing i am terribly affraid they know i saw them.
content.summary: A large object with lights around traveling faster than anything i have ever seen

content.detailedDescription: Looked out back window and watched an object move fast, it was bright white top, with blue, green and red rotationg bottom, it moved behind a tree went totally white, and dissappeared. i know it was going to be there. the night before we heard an object fly over our house. on the oct. 21, day a military helicopter flew over our house.
content.summary: Watched object move, silver, bright light, green, and re bottom, rotatin as moving.

content.detailedDescription:
My morning walk and pray'r time, stepp'd outside to the first clear morning in so many days.  the stars were bright, constellations clear and present. no moon visible.  

look'd up and noticed the big dipper to the north -- as i look'd into the top right of the constellation i noted a blimp of bright light exiting the confines of the dipper and proceed to the east.  it was momentary but traveling and then disappear'd.  there were no clouds nor haze.

then i turn'd to walk south and headed toward an open area, i could see orion clearly, also sirius, the dog constellation and the dog star.  from the tip top of sirius the dog star came a pinpoint of bullet like traveling star moving toward the north-east rapidly.  i watched it for about 40 seconds and it disappear'd.

lastly, as i gazed into the sky a shooting fireball fell between orion's outstretched left arm and the sirius dog star.
content.summary: Three celestial sightings

content.detailedDescription:
I live about 10 miles from the pittsburgh international airport.
it was the weekend of wings over pittsburgh air show hosted by the 911th airlift wing of the air force reserve command. may 10 - 11 2008.

i heard the jets getting close to here, where they make there turn and return back to the base. when i first looked out the window in the door, i was looking up trying to see the jets and when i didn���t see the jets then i glanced down and i seen the >   v formation.  it is hard to explain but it just did not fit, it was like a insert, it looked identical to cd discs except no center hole  but the reflection was identical and a perfect v formation. i have heard that there are more sightings when there is a war, now there was no war here but there was unusual air activity. 

when i seen it over mcmichell rd. i think it was stationary for a while then it started moving slowly to the right and i seen it go behind the trees at my neighbors house across the street, i thought i would continue seeing them but it never came out from behind the trees. it was energy of some kind. i did not take my eyes off of it. it never entered my brain to get a camera, i was just locked on to it. 

if someone would have put 7 cd discs in a v formation on a long sheet of plexiglas and was moving it to the right out side my door that is what it looked like. it stood out, it was on top of the view i was seeing but it went behind my neighbors trees across the street. it just did not belong there, do you know what i mean. it was memorizing, i could feel it, or i was like connected to it in a way. i did not count the discs but when i drew them on the computer 7 discs looker closer to what i seen compared to five discs.  one thing for sure it was a perfect even v, but in this direction >  .  it was so different from photos  and videos of ufo's i have seen. i don���t think it carried passengers. it just looked like energy. 

i always wondered why people took a sighting so serious and went to gatherings. i am hooked now. i will always be searching for what i seen. it only lasted maybe a minute.  there is no way it was of this earth. the object i seen makes all the others i have seen photos of look primitive. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 7 discs in a v formation, like this. 



                                   ￼
things like this don���t fly. but these discs did. i was not looking up. i was looking out, like this. 

￼

this is not the first time i had seen something, about 40 years ago i was in wv, south of moundsville late at night  and we were up on a detour above closed rt 2, and it was dark no houses around and my friend and myself seen light, that is it, just light, but i know i was going across the top on the detour when we seen the light, but i remember being back down on rt 2 and one of us said to one another, did you see that and the other said yes and we never talked about it after that. i did not see anything, i just remember light. we grew up together but still we never brought it up again. why ? 
years later he moved away and we never keep in touch.
content.summary: 7 cd type dics in a >   v formation

content.detailedDescription: I was finishing my lunch at boston market off of westhiemer/hilcroft.  i was on my way back to the office, but i happened to look up and saw a black object that seemed to hover below the cloud cover at about the same altitude that helicopters fly.  the object seemed to move in a north western direction until it seemed to move straight up over the period of about 3 minutes, and it penetrated the cloud cover until it was out of sight.  i had to get back to my office on stoney brook and the westpark tollway by 1:30pm, so i didn't get to stick around to watch for it further.
content.summary: A black oval/cylinder shaped object hovered below the cloud cover and then moved straight up.

content.detailedDescription:
I never had any reason to look up at the stars unless there was a meteor shower going on but all that changed when i got stuck working the graveyard shift about a year ago. i am a maintenance technician and at  work we can't smoke in the break room so me and the guys went outside to burn one. that's when one of the maintenance guys said that recently he saw a bright light in the sky that was turning off and on. and one of the other maintenance guys said he saw something like that too, he said it was weird almost like it was taking pictures because the light would get bright then turn off. now i have seen this bright light in the sky a total of 3 times since then.The first time in nov. 2008 around 2:30 am located in the western sky ,thats when from the corner of my eye this very bright light caught my attention.. i kept looking in that direction and saw nothing but a few seconds later there it was again, got real bright then dimmed out. the second time in dec. 2008 around 3:00 am. in the northern sky a co-worker said hey look over there it's one of those bright flashing lights. we saw it grow in intensity then dim out repeating the cycle for 2 minutes.
 the most recent sighting was on  july 7,2009 at 4:45 am.Located in the n.Eastern sky.I was outside setting up my telescope, i had plans to see jupitor for the first time through a telescope, the skys were clear and jupitor was really bright. as i was getting lined up with the spotting scope there it was a bright light that would it grow in intensity then dim out repeating the cycle for only 30 seconds. but this time it acted as if it was trying to mimick a star or a planet.
content.summary: Stationary,high altitude, bright pulsing light

content.detailedDescription: I am a third party to this incident. my friend who wants to remain anonymous caught this footage on his vhs recorder. my friends son was outside in the backyard of thier house and looked up because he saw something strange. my friends son yelled for his dad to come out and see the unknown object in the sky. my friend saw the unknown object and grabbed his vhs recorder and began recording the unknown object which appeared to be in mid air. the unknown object had lights and appeared to be spinning with other parts spinning at different times. at one time in the footage you can see and hear a plane fly by the unknown object. this unknown object did not make a sound. my friend moved to a rural location in manfield, tx where the neighborhood homes were was just being built. my friend was one of around six homes built in the new nieghborhood. my friend called me over to his house and i observed the footage and was amazed. i have never seen whatever it is ever in my life.
content.summary: Spinning sphere with lights

content.detailedDescription:
Well i will start from 2 days prior, at about 8 or 9 o'clock pm, i was letting my dog out for a bathroom run before we got settled in. the sky was clear and all the stars were visible. i started to notice a star moving straight for a short period of time pretty fast then suddenly it started going diaginal but at the same speed, so i just figured it was a satilite. 
  the next 2 days went by and i thought nothing of it, until i was letting the dog out again as usual, at about the same time as 2 days prior and i had noticed that the moon was full and huge that night and as i was looking at it from my front steps i noticed a similar star except only this time it was lower or at least seemed lower, and was moving slower than last time. so this time i yelled into the door way for my girlfriend and brother to come out to see what it was that i had been seeing, they came out and i pointed it out to them in which they both saw it, my brother got bored quick and said it was nothing and went back into the house but my girlfriend stayed. we watched it moving from the left of the sky to the right and then suddenly as we were both seeing this star moving it just stopped and did not move at all, now satailites don"t do that! "that i know of". i called my mother instantly to tell her what we were witnessing and as i was talking to her, about ten minutes went by and it was still there in the same spot. i hung up with my mother and started looking at this star with my girl for a little longer, (now we kept looking because its not everyday stars just stop moving), anyway the star was in the same position for about 15 minutes in tottal when the craziest thing i had ever witnessed had happened. the star got really bright almost as if it was about to become a bigger star then just shot straight up and was gone. the thing is when it happened i felt weird almost like being in a fun house, my brain was not concepting what had just happened almost not believing even though it was staring right in the face. my girlfriend and i looked at each other at the same exact time after it had dissapeared and yes we both saw the same exact star????  ever since i have been obsessed with finding out some truth to everything. i feel mankind can handle change. i know its a little late for me to be talking about it now but at that time i would not have known who to tell.
content.summary: Unlike anything i would think to be made by mankind.

content.detailedDescription:
This evening i decided to go out on deck in my backyard to look at the stars. i do this all the time. tonight i saw something strange, and its been a long time since i have seen anything strange in the sky.

i see a bright orange light emerge from behind the trees. it had two whit lights on its sides, maybe on the fuselage or something. as i watch this  fly over it does something that surprised me. suddenly it's lights turn off for about a second, and it lights back up again but with a whole new light patten that looks similar to any regular airplane flying over. 

i go in the house to tell my husband what i was, of course he looks at me like i am a freak. i go back outside to watch some more and to my surprise i see another orange light (same as the other) coming over the trees and this time i yell for my husband, and of course he doesn't come. then can you believe it....The orange light gos out and all i see is a red and white blinking light in the distance. this time it seemed to change much sooner then the other one. the first one was closer when the light went out and then changed. 

i live in the country, and i see planes fly over all the time, this is something i never see.

is this normal behavior of and airplane. can an airplane change its light pattern in the middle of a flight and is what i described seem normal??

could this have been a ufo???
content.summary: Bright orange light turns into a airplane right before my eyes

content.detailedDescription:
I went to my back yard to smoke a cigarette i sat on my porch and as i looked up, i seen a ufo from my backyard, it was circular, and seemed to be translucent with a gel like substance that covered it, lights were perfectly spaced around it, it moved through the sky like a jellyfish would through water, it was 200-400 feet in diameter, please call i have nothing too gain or lose i just need to talk to someone that believes...Cell#720-470-8710 my name is francesco. 

the amazing thing about this circumstance is that a witness is backing me up i went to the corner and this man seen it as well and he is willing to talk as well...............Please call!!!I have nothing to hide.
content.summary: I seen a ufo from my backyard, it was circular, and seemed to be translucent with a gel like substance that covered it, lights were perfectly spaced around it, it moved through the sky like a jellyfish would underwater, it was 200-400 feet in diameter,

content.detailedDescription:
8 orange circular object flying from northeast going south really high in the sky. to the naked eye they appeared like a burred cluster. with binoculars they were clearly not birds or any other known aircraft. i have seen these before.

i was sitting in my backyard having a cigarette and was on the telephone looking up when i noticed them. i frequently see objects in the sky so am aware when i spot an unusual object.

the objects were flying in a straight line and passed over in less than a minute. i mentioned what i was seeing to the person on the other end of the telephone call and mentioned that i was running indoors to get the binoculars. i gave them a play by play. the object went out of sight when they passed beyond my vantage point.
content.summary: Pearl strand
